verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARG1: that his summit with Kim Jong Un is back on] . This news came after senior North Korean official Kim Yong Chol hand - delivered a letter from Kim Jong Un to the President .

President Donald Trump announced on Friday that [ARG1: his summit with Kim Jong Un] [V: is] [ARG2: back on] . This news came after senior North Korean official Kim Yong Chol hand - delivered a letter from Kim Jong Un to the President .

President Donald Trump announced on Friday that his summit with Kim Jong Un is back on . [ARG1: This news] [V: came] [ARGM-TMP: after senior North Korean official Kim Yong Chol hand - delivered a letter from Kim Jong Un to the President] .

President Donald Trump announced on Friday that his summit with Kim Jong Un is back on . This news came after [ARG0: senior North Korean official Kim Yong Chol] [ARGM-MNR: hand] - [V: delivered] [ARG1: a letter] [ARG3: from Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: to the President] .
